00049 class OPENMM_EXPORT HarmonicAngleForce : public Force {
00050 public:
00054     HarmonicAngleForce();
00058     int getNumAngles() const {
00059         return angles.size();
00060     }
00071     int addAngle(int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, double angle, double k);
00082     void getAngleParameters(int index, int& particle1, int& particle2, int& particle3, double& angle, double& k) const;
00093     void setAngleParameters(int index, int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, double angle, double k);
00094 protected:
00095     ForceImpl* createImpl();
00096 private:
00097     class AngleInfo;
00098     std::vector<AngleInfo> angles;
00099 };
00100 
00105 class HarmonicAngleForce::AngleInfo {
00106 public:
00107     int particle1, particle2, particle3;
00108     double angle, k;
00109     AngleInfo() {
00110         particle1 = particle2 = particle3 = -1;
00111         angle = k = 0.0;
00112     }
00113     AngleInfo(int particle1, int particle2, int particle3, double angle, double k) :
00114         particle1(particle1), particle2(particle2), particle3(particle3), angle(angle), k(k) {
00115     }
00116 };
